snippet.title: Legendary Tales: Stolen Life [Official Trailer]
snippet.description:
Discover a brand-new game series by FIVE-BN STUDIO!

After the disappearance of their parents and the death of their guardian, Lucia and her brother Ulf lived and worked in a tavern. But their lives changed dramatically when Ulf turned 18. 

He turned out to be a werewolf, and on the day of his full age, Ulf was abducted by a witch and taken to an undisclosed location. 

Lucia is willing to risk everything to save her brother, who has always taken care of her. For the first time in many years of her secluded life, adventures await her on the way full of unpredictable dangers. 

Solve dozens of puzzles and challenge yourself with exciting mini-games to save a werewolf's life and bring justice to the land ruled by cruel witches.

Don’t miss the beginning of a new fascinating saga! 
Coming soon!
